allow: Bash(# Check the download configuration - what bbox was actually used? grep -A 20 ""acquire_conus_data\\|bbox\\|Midwest"" CONUS_HLS_drought_monitoring/01a_midwest_data_acquisition_parallel.R)
Bash(# Check how many granules have been downloaded for 2021 so far find /mnt/malexander/datasets/ndvi_monitor/bulk_downloads_raw/S30/2021/ -name ""*.tif"")
Bash(# The slower download - check docker container processes docker exec conus-hls-drought-monitor ps aux)

Bash(# Now check the Docker/slower process - what year is it on? # Look for any running R scripts or download scripts inside the container docker exec conus-hls-drought-monitor ls /home/ ; docker exec conus-hls-drought-monitor ls /app/ ; docker exec conus-hls-drought-monitor ls /)
Bash(# Check what the Docker container was doing - look for R script logs, cron jobs, etc. docker exec conus-hls-drought-monitor ls /home/rstudio/)
Bash(# Check if there''s a separate log for the Docker slower download \(2025 year?\) ls /mnt/malexander/datasets/ndvi_monitor/)

Bash(# Check how the 2025 download was started - look for the script grep -l ""download_2025"" /home/malexander/r_projects/github/NDVI_drought_monitoring/CONUS_HLS_drought_monitoring/scripts/*.R ; ls /home/malexander/r_projects/github/NDVI_drought_monitoring/CONUS_HLS_drought_monitoring/scripts/)
Bash(# Check if .netrc is accessible inside the container docker exec conus-hls-drought-monitor ls -la /home/rstudio/.netrc || docker exec conus-hls-drought-monitor cat /etc/passwd)
